RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered F oals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOSHEN sharp break from inside, took over went clear stretch, held on. SPARE A DIME good position to the turn, came running late in a good effort. VILLAREGGIA inside run to the turn, rallied while closing gap for show spot. STARSHIP NUGGET raced along evenly with no late response when needed. TOTO'SRUBYSLIPPERS went with leader to the turn, went wrong into the turn and pulled up in distress in mid stretch and subsequently vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Villareggia
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the turn, rallied while closing gap for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Goshen
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break from inside, took over went clear stretch, held on

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Nugget
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Spare a Dime
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the turn, came running late in a good effort

ENTRY.NAME: Toto'srubyslippers
ENTRY.COMMENT: went with leader to the turn, went wrong, pulled up, vanned off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferre d).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RHYTHMIC RULER sharp to the front, stayed clear throughout with good handling to the wire. OVER CALENDARED off rail chasing winner throughout to no avail, best of the rest. PAID TWICE bit slow from the gate, raced wide past quarter pole for show. POUR ME A DOUBLE raced along evenly with no response from quarter pole. CINDY'S STORM raced off rail to the stretch while fading. SENSE SHINES raced a wide trip while never a menace throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Pour Me a Double
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response from quarter pole

ENTRY.NAME: Rhythmic Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp to the front, stayed clear throughout with good handling

ENTRY.NAME: Over Calendared
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail chasing winner throughout to no avail, best of the rest

ENTRY.NAME: Cindy's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced off rail to the stretch while fading through the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Paid Twice
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit slow from the gate, raced wide past quarter pole for show

ENTRY.NAME: Sense Shines
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced a wide trip while never a menace throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $6,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $12,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 12, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Si nce Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIMIT UP good speed from gate, dueled to turn, took over while saving ground an stayed clear under good nadling to the wire. EL PEJE broke a bit awkward from the gate, close up three wide to the turn, stayed on for place to wire. SAY IT AIN'T SO outsprinted from the gate, saved ground throughput for show spot. UNCLE EARL dueled winner early on with nothing left and faded in stretch. MASTER LEA raced evenly along while well off the inside throughout. HENDRIX between horses to the turn, could not go on and faded back.

ENTRY.NAME: Say It Ain't So
ENTRY.COMMENT: outsprinted from the gate, saved ground throughput for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Master Lea
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly along while well off the inside throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Limit Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed from gate, dueled to turn, took over, stayed clear

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Earl
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled winner early on with nothing left and faded in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Hendrix
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses to the turn, could not go on and faded back

ENTRY.NAME: El Peje
ENTRY.OWNER: Esquivel Maria and Esquivel Jose Jesus
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, close up three wide to the turn, stayed for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEEN LOUISE sharp speed to the front, hooked in a stretch duel to the wire won the bob under stout handling. POQUITO ROSE saved ground throughout, slipped through, dueled in the final furlong while all out and just lost the bob on the wire. ABOUNDING pestered winner into the turn and stretch, stayed game to the wire for show spot. SHANNON'S GIRL raced off rail while evenly throughout and no late kick. SHESMYBROKER always trailed with no response from the turn to the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Poquito Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout, slipped through dueled lost the bob

ENTRY.NAME: Shesmybroker
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed with no response from the turn to the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Queen Louise
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp speed to front, hooked in stretch duel to wire prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Abounding
ENTRY.COMMENT: pestered winner into turn and stretch, stayed game to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Shannon's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced off rail while evenly throughout and no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: U SO MONEY BABY back to turn, launched a late kick into the stretch run, angled in and split horses in the final furlong to be along at the wire. SUPORB slight bobble at the start, inside run to turn, got through and cleared into the stretch but run down in the final stages. JOLIE RULER raced along evenly from off rail throughout. ONTOTHENEXT tried to keep up throughout with no response in the stretch. LUCKY LAUREN sprinted to the lead, collared into turn, gave in readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Ontothenext
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up throughout with no response in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Suporb
ENTRY.COMMENT: slight bobble, inside run to turn, got through, cleared/run down

ENTRY.NAME: U So Money Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: back to turn, launched a late kick, angled in, split horses, up

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Lauren
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the lead, collared into turn, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Jolie Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from off rail throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BETTERING bit awkward from gate, never far back to the turn, in a drive outside to the stretch, ran clear late as much the best while ridden out in the final sixteenth to the wire. MEXITEXAFORNIA sprinted clear outside, secured rail to stretch, no match late. STRIKING SPARKS inside run to the turn, no late response in the stretch run. MANSION PARTY chased leader to stretch, wilted in the final sixteenth. HEARTFELT KARTER always trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Sparks
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the turn, no late response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Mansion Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to stretch, wilted in the final sixteenth

ENTRY.NAME: Bettering
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from gate, in a drive outside to stretch, ran clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Heartfelt Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Mexitexafornia
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear outside, secured rail to stretch, no match late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOTSOMEMOJO no hurry to far turn, rallied outside with a late run, cleared. ESTILO PELIGROSO never far back, good position to stretch short late lead run down. CACAHUETE tracked top pair to far turn, bid eighth pole, weakened late. CONGRATS THIS inside run first turn to the lead, held to deep stretch, faltered. HONDO GUSTO saved ground throughout with no late response late going. ESPECIALLEA pressed leader to quarter pole, faltered in the stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Congrats This
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run first turn to the lead, held to deep stretch, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Gotsomemojo
ENTRY.COMMENT: no hurry to far turn, rallied outside with a late run, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Hondo Gusto
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout with no late response late going

ENTRY.NAME: Especiallea
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed leader to quarter pole, faltered in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Peligroso
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, good position to stretch short late lead run down

ENTRY.NAME: Cacahuete
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked top pair to far turn, bid eighth pole, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1 1/16M Turf CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J M VELA rail trip to stretch, angled out eighth pole to clear in impressive fashion under a heady ride in the final furlong. NOELANI chased leader to the half, cleared to stretch, run down late while grudgingly to the wire in a game effort. BRIC A BRAC shuffled back inside to the half, angled out while evenly for show spot. DOWHATEVERITTAKES ran up to the lead, shuffled back to the far turn, improved late. ARTEMUS SWEETHEART off rail pressing pace to far turn, weakened in the final furlong. PLEDGULATIONS inside speed saved ground throughout while tiring in the stretch. FRACING ALLSTAR never menaced dropping far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Fracing Allstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced dropping far back

ENTRY.NAME: Dowhateverittakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran up to the lead, shuffled back to the far turn, improved late

ENTRY.NAME: J M Vela
ENTRY.COMMENT: rail trip to stretch, angled out eighth pole to clear, impressive

ENTRY.NAME: Pledgulations
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed saved ground throughout while tiring in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Bric a Brac
ENTRY.OWNER: Harrison Ann M and Hendrickson Renata D
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back inside to the half, angled out while evenly for 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Sweetheart
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail pressing pace to far turn, weakened in the final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Noelani
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the half, cleared through stretch, run down late
